content: hear� centre� croche� squar� the approximate size of these squares is 11 x 11cm when using a 4 0mm hook and dk yarn neede� ● yarn a heart colour ● yarn b square colour ● hook suitable size for your yarn ● scissors ● sewing needle skill� ● magic_ring - magic_ring ● chain - chain ● double_crochet - double_crochet ● extended double_crochet - edc ● half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet ● increase - increase ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● slip_stitch - slip_stitch ● treble_crochet - treble_crochet ● fasten_off - fo note� - chains at the start of each row do not count as stitches - instructions within are to be worked into an individual stitch - the total number of stitches is indicated in at the end of each step hear� centr� 1 using yarn a create a magic_ring ch2 double_crochet x 12 slip_stitch into the first st 12 2 skip the first and second sts of the previous row one of which will be the one you just slip stitched into double_crochet edc treble_crochet x 3 treble_crochet edc double_crochet double_crochet increase x 2 edc treble_crochet edc double_crochet increase x 2 double_crochet edc treble_crochet treble_crochet x 3 edc double_crochet skip the following stitch slip_stitch into next st - this will be the first double_crochet of the previous round/the first st skipped at the start of this round change colour squar� 3 ch3 edc double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet ch2 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet edc treble_crochet x 2 ch2 treble_crochet x 2 edc double_crochet double_crochet x 2 double_crochet edc treble_crochet x 2 ch2 treble_crochet x 2 edc double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet ch2 double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet edc slip_stitch into the first st of the round 40 + 8 chains 4 ch2 double_crochet x 5 work double_crochet x 2 ch2 double_crochet x 2 into the chain corner double_crochet x 10 double_crochet x 2 ch2 double_crochet x 2 into the chain corner repeat this line x 3 double_crochet x 5 slip_stitch into the first st of the round 64 5 ch1 single_crochet x 8 single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the chain gap single_crochet x 16 single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in the chain gap repeat this line x 3 single_crochet x 8 slip_stitch into the first st of the row 72 fasten_off weave in your ends and you are done
